item.title: Post-installation for archlinux
item.description: Reboot into the new system Set the keyboard layout and Console fonts If you have the 4K display, console fonts will be extremely small. $ setfont sun12x22 Connect to the internet nmcli device wifi list nmcli device wifi connect TP-LINK_GZS password a3628436 ping baidu.com Unofficial user repositories sudo vim /etc/pacman.conf [archlinuxcn] Server = https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/archlinuxcn/$arch Adding unofficial keys sudo pacman -Syy && sudo pacman -S archlinuxcn-keyring Fonts sudo pacman -S ttc-iosevka-slab noto-fonts noto-fonts-cjk noto-fonts-emoji tf-latinmodern-math ttf-inconsolata Graphical user interface Display server sudo pacman -S xorg-server xorg-xrdb xorg-xbacklight xorg-xrdb is using to loading a user-level configuration dotfile, typically located at ~/.

item.title: Setup a Archlinux / Windows10 dual booting system
item.description: Before Check the hardware, three disks on my Lenovo ThinkPad P50 Samsung SSD 970 EVO Plus 250GB for installing windows Samsung SSD 960 EVO 250GB for installling archlinux WDC WD5000LPLX-0 HHD 500GB for data storage Disable Windows Fast Startup if start from windows Disable UEFI Secure Boot. (Arch Linux install media does not support Secure Boot.)
